title: Business & Finance
text:
---

A long-simmering feud between tech giants reignited, with Microsoft's president lashing out at Google and the search juggernaut's top lawyer firing back.

---

Ant Group CEO Simon Hu resigned, the company said. Chairman Eric Jing will take up the chief executive role at the Chinese fintech giant.

---

Short-seller Hindenburg took aim at electric-truck startup Lordstown, saying the company misled investors. Lordstown's CEO hit back at the accusations.

---

Branson's Virgin Orbit has hired bankers to help the satellite-launching startup go public this year through a SPAC deal.

---

Ford nominated a pair of fifth-generation descendants of Henry Ford to its board.
